Name: Cloak & Dagger: Shadow Operations
About the game: Cloak & Dagger: Shadow Operations is a short, single player, third person, tactical stealth action game set in the early 1990's meant to be finished in one sitting. Use the shadows, shoot out lights, stun enemies, and conceal yourself in the darkness through 5 Missions. -Story- The year is 1993. A breakaway faction within the UN has dedicated resources to creating a new, special, intelligence and sabotage task force entrusted with unveiling corrupt secrets of powerful forces and their intentions to the world. Move through the dark and bring their actions into the light. -Light & Shadow- Use the shadows as a weapon. Stalk your enemies from the darkness, strike and retreat into the veil. Shoot out lights and disable generators, or blind pursuers with flashbangs. -Silence & Sound- The environment is alive with sound. Use ambient audio to mask your movements. Be careful where you step, what surface you move on will make more or less sound depending on the material. Slink through snow or grass, while avoiding broken glass and metal grates. Your enemy is always listening. -Truth & Lies- Play through a linear, story-driven campaign set after the collapse of the Soviet Union and the rise of foreign intervention, private military companies, and nation-backed militant groups. Uncover the corrupt intentions of major powers and their ploys. Follow on Twitter: Join the Discord Community:
